channel.title: question about game engines.
channel.description: So I play Black Hawk Down, and Joint Ops/escalation. They use ALMOST the same engine. JO/E uses an updated version of the black hawk down engine. So i was wondering if anyone would know if it was possible to port the weapons from JO/E over to BHD, even though JO/e is an updated engine.

item.title: question about game engines.
item.dc:creator: snakedoctor
item.description:
I believe it’s just visual.

if you play, BHD was going to have drivable vehicles for the 1.5 update. except novalogic decided to save it for JO.

Read full topic

item.title: question about game engines.
item.dc:creator: Someonerandm
item.description:
It would probably be easier to port BHD to the updated engine, since I’d assume the weapons used the upgrades. Also, how upgraded is the engine?

Read full topic

item.title: question about game engines.

item.description:
